content: Well, I think that depends on what you work best with to process and keep current with the information. The docs of previous chats don't seem to work as you seem to have constraints imposed around processing and retaining all that information at once. This also depends on the time required to set them up. If we can have something to show for on Monday, even if it's not the resume and job search execution, that is fine, this is innovative and solving a real problem that exists that would be worth the effort while also demonstrating AI capabilities publicly which will help secure the type of role I want and support long term efforts.
